reviews.customers_say: Customers love the sweater's style, particularly its unique design in the back, and find it super soft and comfortable.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, classy, and warm
items.body: So cute and comfy. It washes well, didnt shrink at all, and always comes out of my dryer with no wrinkles. The quality is great, a little heavy, just enough to feel warm during the colder fall season. We'll worth the money:) Color is also very pretty. Read more
items.author: Kalee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Charming Bow-Back Sweater
items.body: This sweater is just adorable. The standout feature is definitely the v-neck back with the delicate bow. It is such a cute, unexpected detail that gives the sweater a flirty and feminine feel without trying too hard. It adds just the right amount of visual interest, especially if you wear your hair up or styled to show it off. The material is lightweight and airy, with a nice thinness that makes it perfect for early fall or layering on cooler days. It has a soft stretch to it and is slightly oversized, which makes it feel cozy without being bulky. The construction is well done, and the sewing is clean throughout, which really matters with a more delicate piece like this. It drapes nicely on the body, and the quality of the fabric feels soft against the skin. This is one of those easy pieces that looks cute with jeans, skirts, or layered over a dress. It adds charm without any extra effort. Read more
items.author: Sera

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty sweater that fits well
items.body: Great sweater. Fits well. So soft and really pretty. Read more
items.author: Mama M

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Comfortable Top!
items.body: Beautiful top! Quality fabric. Comfortable. Great color. Perfect length. Good value for the money. Read more
items.author: Maria

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Just ok
items.body: The shade of red is very different than I Expected. The photos show a nice deep red but the actual sweater I received is a very bright red that is not flattering on my complexion. The sweater is also very thin material and not very cute from the front. The back is cute and if the color were right I would probably keep it but I just don't like it enough to justify the price. Read more
items.author: Sarah Rohde

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater
items.body: Love this sweater! Fits true to size. It's cute, comfortable and perfect for a casual date night or a to dress up for a work meeting! I got lots of compliments! Read more
items.author: Christine Hoffmann

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful! Photo Doesn’t Do It Justice
items.body: This sweater is beautiful! It’s incredibly soft and comfortable. Well made. The photo does not do this sweater justice. The actual product is so much prettier! If you love the bow trend, but don’t want to spend a lot of money, get this sweater. This is the one to buy. And I don’t think it will get dated. Looks so cute on. Read more
items.author: Georgia Purvis

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater
items.body: Lovely soft sweater. Fit true to size. Love the bow! Read more
items.author: Luanne Holmgren

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 1 Red, Brown, Beau Blue, Gray, Blue, Peach, 1 Burgundy, Dark Green, Parchment, Beige, Yellow, Light Pink, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
